meanings.definition: A narrow band or strip of fabric worn around the head to hold the hair in place.
meanings.sent1: She wore a delicate bandeaux to keep her hair away from her face.
meanings.sent2: The fashion model adorned her outfit with a stylish bandeaux.
meanings.sent3: The bandeaux slipped off her head comically during the dance.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like bandeaux, holding her ideas in place.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bandeaux added a touch of elegance to her look.
